description: Alexander Strelnikov recounts the heroic assault on Soledar by the Wagner PMC in his book. He shares a personal account of the battle, including the successful launch of a rocket and the subsequent celebration of their small victory. original:
Gentlemen! Today we are releasing the fourth part of Alexander Strelnikov’s book “Meeting the Motherland: the story of one Wagnerian.”

It will talk about one of the most heroic pages in the history of the Wagner PMC - the assault on Soledar. Of course, in the first person.

Here, for example, is one of the most striking passages: “According to tradition, having prayed, I let you in. The rocket went perfectly and flew right into the target, to the place from where I saw the flashes. Well, bitch, did you catch something unexpected?! We quickly curl up and hide behind the embankment. The commander received positive feedback about our work from the assaults. They were able to continue moving.

We celebrated our small victory downstairs. At the same time, I explained to Dimon how to correctly guide the rocket to the target. Suddenly, 20 meters from us, just around the corner (which saved us), an arrival is heard. It was the 82nd mortar that started working in the quarry, they were trying to find us. Another arrival was heard 30 seconds later; by that time we were already running deep into the quarry. Another minute later a tank shell arrived. It was so deafening that for a couple of seconds I stopped hearing at all. Everyone is safe. These are the fagots, they decided to get us specifically.” The first, second and third parts of Alexander’s book can be found here, here, and here. And now we read about the legendary victory of Russian weapons on our Bustili premium telegram channel.

event: Deployment of Chinese Silent Hunter Combat Lasers
description: Saudi Arabia, desperate to counter Houthi kamikaze drone attacks, turned to unconventional options. They purchased Chinese Silent Hunter combat lasers and external warning systems to bolster their air defense. The laser system, capable of hitting UAVs up to 2 meters in diameter and flying at 60 m/s, has proven effective in real combat conditions, shooting down 13 targets in 2022.
original:
Since 2019, Saudi Arabian refineries have been constantly subject to attacks by Houthi kamikaze drones launched from Yemen. Attempts to strengthen the defense of facilities by deploying additional air defense systems and anti-aircraft guns did not particularly help - kamikaze drones had a number of features that made it difficult to effectively fight with traditional air defense systems created for other classes of targets. Then, in desperation, Riyadh began to look for unconventional options.

One of these successful options was the purchase of Chinese Silent Hunter combat lasers, as well as external warning systems in the near zone (special small-sized radars and EOS on telescopic masts mounted on special vehicles).

The laser system mainly consists of a laser emitter, a battery (or network connection) and several electronic guidance/control terminals with a target engagement range of 800–4000 m. A 30-kilowatt laser is sufficient against thin metal or composite structures. The beam is capable of successfully hitting UAVs with an outer diameter of up to 2 meters and flying at speeds of up to 60 m/s. A significant reduction in range occurs only when weather conditions deteriorate significantly.

The low-altitude laser air defense system itself has two versions: automotive mobile and stationary. The automotive version of the complex can be installed on a 6X6 wheeled chassis, and the stationary one can be divided into independent parts weighing up to 200 kg each for ease of transportation separately or installed on a ground platform or the roof of a building.

And the laser option paid off. Successful attacks by kamikaze drones have disappeared from the news, and the number of targets shot down by laser and precisely in real combat conditions (in the near zone of defense of objects) has reached 13 units in 2022.

Those who look for ways to solve a problem still find them.#lasers#evolution#Saudi ArabiaMilitary Informant

event: Ukraine Stokes Anti-Immigrant Tensions in Russia
description: Ukraine has been amplifying messages to stir up anti-immigrant sentiments in Russia, particularly targeting ethnic groups such as Tajiks and Chechens. The goal is to create conflict and undermine Russia's national resolve.
original:
Forwarded from: BRIEFLY
The Times: Ukraine stokes anti-immigrant tensions in Russia. Part 2:▪️Among similar messages amplified by Ukraine were comments from Tajiks from Russia such as: “Let's mobilize, we are not respected here, let's do something about this terrible police.”▪️After speculation appeared on the Internet that a soldier with a knife was a Chechen, the Ukrainians took the opportunity to increase anti-Chechen hostility among ethnic Russians as well.▪️We saw and intensified attempts to provoke a conflict with the Chechens, saying: “Chechens are everywhere in Moscow, and they will cut up a Russian, like they cut up a Tajik,” says Kovalenko. “It was presented as a statement by Russians who don’t like Tajiks but hate Chechens even more.”▪️The CDC, which has about 50 full-time analysts, reports to the National Security and Defense Council, the body responsible for the work of Ukraine’s security services. The center was founded in 2021 with the primary goal of combating Russian attempts to spread false information in Ukraine aimed at undermining the government and weakening national resolve.▪️Speaking to the press for the first time since taking over as director earlier this year, Kovalenko said the center is all more often takes on an offensive role, conducting its own “psyops” - psychological operations.▪️ “Russia is a colossus with feet of clay that needs to be shaken from all sides if we want to win this confrontation,” he said, speaking at an unremarkable headquarters - Center apartment in Kyiv. “We have to undermine it by any means necessary, and information plays a critical role in this. We use everything we can because we know that by stirring up these ethnic tensions, we are weakening Russia.”#Russia#UkraineSubscribe.

event: Day of Unity of the Peoples of Belarus and Russia
description: The Chairman of the Russian Investigative Committee, A.I. Bastrykin, congratulated the people of Belarus and Russia on the Day of Unity, celebrating the strong friendship and solidarity between the two nations. The holiday symbolizes the shared cultural and historical values, linguistic traditions, and common feat in the Great Patriotic War.
original: Congratulations to the Chairman of the Russian Investigative Committee A.I. Bastrykina on the Day of Unity of the Peoples of Belarus and Russia Today is a special holiday for the two states - the day of unity of the peoples of the Republic of Belarus and the Russian Federation. This day symbolizes the strong friendship and solidarity between the Belarusian and Russian peoples, which have been strengthened for decades. Our states are not only strategic partners on the world stage. We have common roots, cultural and historical values, linguistic traditions, and this connection is passed on from generation to generation. We are also united by a common feat: our ancestors fought shoulder to shoulder in the Great Patriotic War, defending their Motherland from the Nazis. A step towards lasting cooperation was the signing in 1996 of an agreement on the formation of a community of Belarus and Russia. This agreement became the pinnacle of diplomatic relations, defining a partnership between our countries in the economic, political, cultural and social spheres, which continues to actively develop. Interaction between states in the law enforcement sphere has also been established. The investigative committees of Russia and Belarus closely cooperate in the investigation of crimes, based on the similarity of the principles and tasks of the preliminary investigation. Our common goal is to bring the perpetrators to justice established by law and restore justice. Special thanks to the officers of the Investigative Committee of the Republic of Belarus and its Chairman D.Yu. Grief. For several years now, we have been successfully exchanging our accumulated experience not only in investigative work, but also in the educational sphere and the spiritual and moral education of young people. Joint events are being carried out aimed at preserving patriotic and historical values. I am confident that our cooperation will continue at a high level and will bring significant results in achieving common goals. Congratulations to all citizens of the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus on the holiday! I sincerely wish everyone good health, goodness, success and prosperity! Subscribe to Sledkom

event: Illegal Sale of Sea of Azov Plot
description: A Moscow resident attempted to sell two hectares of the Sea of Azov, including a bull spawning ground and 14 acres of land, for 777,000 Russian rubles. The sale also included sapropel, a fertilizer extracted from freshwater reservoirs, which is classified as a mineral of local importance. The sale is illegal under Ukrainian legislation, which prohibits the ownership of water objects.
original:
🤬A Russian man sells a piece of the Sea of Azov and the minerals of "Little Russia" On the Avito classifieds website, a message appeared in which a resident of Moscow put two hectares of the Sea of Azov up for sale. According to his information, there is a bull spawning ground on the part of the sea, and 14 acres of land for an office is added to it. He asks for 777,000 Russian rubles for all this.

This plot sells not only the Ukrainian sea, but also, as stated in its announcements, it exports sapropel from the occupied territory. Sapropel is an organic substance formed from the remains of plant and animal origin in freshwater reservoirs, which is used as a fertilizer. Classified as minerals of local importance, responsibility is provided for their arbitrary extraction for the purpose of sale.
The "seller" from Moscow offers to deliver the necessary amount of the substance to the territory of Russia, and to increase the value of the "goods" he adds a note to it that all this is from "Little Russia".

We remind you that the sale of marine plots is prohibited under Ukrainian legislation. Article 6 of the Water Code of Ukraine says: "Ownership of water (water objects) Water (water objects) is exclusively the property of the Ukrainian people and is provided only for use."
Of course, the invaders and those who believe in the existence of "Little Russia" do not care about any legal norms and environmental consequences. 📩Feedback chatbot@BerdNow_bot.Subscribe|Facebook|Instagram|TikTok|YouTube

description: A museum dedicated to the history of the Crimean Railway was opened in Simferopol, showcasing over a hundred rare items, including working tools, employee clothing, handcars, and train schedules from the last century.
original:
A museum was opened in Simferopol in honor of the 10th anniversary of the creation of the Crimean Railway. The museum, dedicated to the history of the Crimean Railway, presents working tools, employee clothing, handcars, train schedules of the last century and other exhibits. In total, the collection contains more than a hundred rare items, each of which is part of the 148-year history of the Crimean highways.

The opening of the museum was timed to coincide with the 10th anniversary of the enterprise. If previously small thematic collections were organized at the stations, this year the exhibition covers the entire history. What other exhibits of the history of the KR are presented in the museum - see our story Crimea 24 |@tvcrimea24

event: Rheinmetall CEO Announces Possible US Refusal to Defend Europe
description: Armin Papperger, CEO of German defense concern Rheinmetall, stated that the United States may not come to Europe's aid in the event of a military threat. He cited the US's shift in focus towards the Asia-Pacific region and its reluctance to pay for allies' defense costs.
original:
“Thicken the picture”: why the head of the Rheinmetall concern announced Washington’s possible refusal to defend Europe

In the event of a military threat to Europe, the United States will not come to its aid, said Armin Papperger, CEO of the German defense concern Rheinmetall. According to him, the United States has made it clear that it will no longer pay for the defense costs of its allies, and the Asia-Pacific region is now of greater interest to Washington. Experts note that the head of Rheinmetall wants to receive more large orders for his concern, but at the same time, the United States is really reconsidering relations with its allies.

The United States will not come to the aid of Europe in the event of a military threat to the region, says Armin Papperger, CEO of the German defense concern Rheinmetall. In an interview with the Financial Times, the businessman emphasized that in recent decades, European leaders have taken it for granted that the United States would lend a helping hand in the event of a military threat.

description: Vatfor's assessment of the damage to Ukraine's energy system is exaggerated. Hydroelectric power plants play a crucial role in power maneuvering, enabling the increase of frequency and voltage during peak consumption hours and avoiding negative consequences for production equipment.
original:
Forwarded from: Fisherman
🇺🇦💡Colleagues from Vatfor slightly exaggerate the damage done to the energy system.n. Ukraine.

In addition, they forget that the energy system as a whole is a balance of generation and consumption. Therefore, for example, hydroelectric power plants, with their ability to turn on at full power in a matter of minutes and turn off just as quickly, are not a trifle, but an important element in power maneuvering: without this, all industrial enterprises will constantly have problems with equipment and accidents.

It is hydroelectric power plants, operating during peak consumption hours (when it exceeds generation), that make it possible to increase the frequency of the generated voltage and current and avoid negative consequences for production equipment. When the peak is smoothed out, they are able, unlike nuclear power plants and thermal power plants (without special equipment), to quickly turn off, which allows generation not to exceed consumption and avoid disruption of technological processes in the so-called industry. description: The war has taken a toll on the city of Belgorod, where the sounds of war are ever-present and the smell of burning lingers in the air. The lives of military families, like the wife of a soldier, are forever changed, filled with fear, uncertainty, and longing for a carefree past. The war has poisoned their souls, leaving deep scars on their hearts.
original:
Forwarded from: Stanislav Varg
​​Oda. Belgorod. She

I couldn’t get past the Belgorod tragedy, which burst into their world and turned it upside down.


She sits in complete silence. Only somewhere in the distance you can hear the sound of a door knocking metal on metal. The smell of burning still lingers in the air, mixed with rusty iron and fear. The wind, as if maddened by the number and awareness of human troubles, frantically sways the leaves on the scorched trees. Somewhere there, beyond the horizon, one can see a changeable haze, sometimes exploding into the silence with loud shudders. It’s like suffering... The suffering of the earth...

Here, in an unnamed front-line city, from now on, life flows according to different laws, different from the ordinary life of rear cities. The laws of almost war, where you imperceptibly begin to fear silence - a harbinger of the next storm.

You’re not used to this, and your husband is in a place where it’s even worse now. Therefore, a smile is a rare guest on a face exhausted from stress.

Typical city. Typical building. You are sitting in one of these dull Soviet-era houses. The windows are curtained with faded curtains, and on the table instead of a tablecloth there is a shabby oilcloth. You are a soldier’s wife who cannot be happy with thousands of rubles.

Her name doesn't matter. Like the name of her husband, lost somewhere in the labyrinth of trenches. For what? There are thousands of them. Wives of defenders, Russian warriors.

However, her eyes, dimmed from tears and sleepless nights, reflect the pain of war. She doesn’t cry yet, doesn’t scream yet, doesn’t curse yet. She's just waiting. Waiting for the next call, news. “I’m alive,” he will say in a slightly cold, hoarse voice. She will continue to live.

His children. Have you seen these people who are serious beyond their years and huddling so close to their mother, as if in search of protection from an invisible enemy? In their eyes there is fear, misunderstanding, longing for a carefree childhood stolen by the war. Their life will not be the same. I hope she doesn't become fatherless.

In this family, like in thousands of others, the war settled forever. This is a front-line city, where not only military families are shuddering. The war poisoned their souls, mutilated their destinies, leaving deep, irreducible scars on their fragile hearts. Only remission, cure is impossible.

She continues to sit in silence. Think. My husband will probably return. Or maybe not. However, even if he returns, the war has already taken its toll. She divided life into “before” and “after,” leaving a gap between them that could not be filled. Everyone thinks about it. There is no need to judge her. A woman is afraid of a future that she cannot understand, and then there is this.

War is not only a battlefield. These are soul-tearing rare calls from the front, sleepless nights waiting for news, emptiness in the eyes of children who have lost their main character.

War is a tragedy that will continue to cripple not only the bodies, but also the souls of people. Only the complete defeat of the enemy will make it possible to breathe deeply and take the path of healing.


St.Varg

description: The Leningrad Regiment 1486 is operating on the approaches to Kleshcheevka, with the 4th Brigade advancing through open terrain. The forest plantation has been largely destroyed, requiring the regiment to consolidate their ground positions. Soldiers are practicing approaches to enemy positions using maps and terrain, identifying optimal routes and hiding spots.
original:
The Leningrad Regiment 1486 is working on the approaches to Kleshcheevka: the 4th Brigade is moving forward through almost bare terrain.

The forest plantation there has been practically destroyed, so we have to consolidate ourselves in the ground.

Groups practice approaching enemy positions using both the map and the terrain. This makes it clearer how best for the soldiers to get through, the battalion commander with the call sign Camp told RT military correspondent Vlad Andritsa@vandrytsa:

“Where you can go through the lowlands, where... where you can already rise to the heights. The complexity of the hollows... they simultaneously [provide complexity] and give us an advantage - the fact that in this hollow we can hide, hide from the same “birds”.

Every day the fighters take up new positions. The main defense center of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which are trying to desperately resist, is the dominant heights around Kleshcheevka.

Watch the report.#Military CorpsRThttps://vk.com/video-66833222_456301710VK VideoVideo by Gorlovka Self-DefenseWatch Video by Gorlovka Self-Defense 5 min 42 s from 2 April 2024 online in HD for free in the VK catalog without signing up! Views: 1.

description: The 72nd OMBr unit conducted training exercises in assault and defense of a position, utilizing paintball weapons and equipment. The training aimed to improve teamwork, tactics, and speed in combat scenarios, emphasizing the importance of being faster and better than the enemy in real battles.
original:
From time to time, the training of assault and defense of a position in a unit looks like this. Paintball weapons, colorful balls, masks and clothes that are not a pity.

We go to the training ground, we divide into "us" and "them". Nobody wants to be "them", but those are the rules of the game. And then we receive tasks, take positions and wait for the command "Start!".
Working in pairs, taking cover, moving forward, holding a position, feeling like a brother next to you, adrenaline - at some point, all this resembles a game where everyone wants to be the winner. A game from childhood, where instead of weapons were tree branches. A game where you raise your hand when you're hurt and step aside to wait to start again.

But we do not train for fun or emotional release. We do it because in a real battle we have to be faster and better than the enemy. Because in real combat, we cannot raise our hand when wounded and step aside to wait when we can start again.

Public relations service of the 72nd OMBr named after Black Zaporozhets

During the performances, the artists undressed on stage to encourage donations. The tour aims to visit 12 cities in Ukraine, with the first show taking place in Sumy on April 1.

He took off his pants for the Armed Forces of Ukraine: Ukrainian showmen started a charity “fire” on stage. In Ukraine, show business stars started a “Pozhezha” (fire) - this is the name of the charity tour, where the artists decided to raise money for the Armed Forces of Ukraine in a unique way.

With this program, singer Vladimir Dantes and showman Alexey Durnev plan to visit about 12 cities of Ukraine. The first performance has already taken place - in Sumy on April 1.

description: Russian occupiers have been experimenting with electronic warfare equipment, including homemade or factory-made devices, to counter FPV drone attacks. The equipment features 8 emitters at a 60° angle to cover 360°, but has limitations due to single-band coverage. The 'daisy' system has been used in conjunction with the RP-377UVM1L 'Little Forest' electronic warfare system.
original:
Russian occupiers continue to experiment with electronic warfare...

In recent days, very strange electronic warfare equipment, either homemade or factory-made, of a new type, have increasingly begun to appear in videos of the destruction of Russian equipment.

In fact, this is not a new complex, but an attempt to solve the problem of attacks by FPV drones, improvised means in semi-handicraft conditions. Namely, place 8 emitters at an angle of 60° and thereby immediately cover 360°.

The problem with this application is single-band coverage. Therefore, it is not surprising that for the first time, when I saw a video with this strange “daisy”, it was also amplified by the RP-377UVM1L “Little Forest” electronic warfare system...

In general, I think that in the near future the following set will become the basis for Russian equipment: “visor”, anti-cumulative grille, single-band “daisy”, “Lesochka” and tactical log. No, but what about without a tactical log?

By the way, all equipment with “daisies” was achieved/killed by drones.

Fatum!

description: A group of volunteers from the Russian Defense Ministry's legendary special forces 'AKHMAT' departed from Grozny International Airport to participate in a special military operation. They completed combat and tactical training at the Russian University of Special Forces and were provided with necessary equipment and support by the Regional Public Foundation.
original:
The legendary special forces "AKHMAT" of the Russian Defense Ministry has been replenished with another group of patriots of our great Motherland who volunteered to defend Russia with arms in hand on the territory of a special military operation.
 
From the Grozny International Airport named after the Hero of Russia Akhmat-Khadzhi Kadyrov, a special plane departed with volunteers @dobrovolci_chechnya, who completed a short course of combat and tactical training with the best instructors on the territory of the world-famous Russian University of Special Forces named after Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin @ruspetsnaz in Gudermes.
 
Patriots of the Fatherland are provided with everything necessary by the Regional Public Foundation named after Hero of Russia Akhmat-Khadzhi Kadyrov@fond_kadyrova. ROF funds cover all travel expenses from the volunteer’s region to Grozny, as well as pay for their accommodation, food and training in RUS. The ROF also provides modern equipment and other equipment necessary for fighters on the line of contact.
 
Dear BROTHERS came to see off the fighters on a good journey and wish them good luck at the plane - Chairman of the Parliament of the Chechen Republic Magomed Daudov@MDaudov_95, Head of the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Emergency Situations of the Russian Federation for the Chechen Republic Alikhan Tsakaev@mchs_95, Minister of Internal Affairs for the Chechen Republic Aslan Iraskhanov and Head of the Directorate of the Russian Guard for the Chechen Republic Sharip Delimkhanov @rosguard_chr.
 
In their parting words, they thanked the parents who raised such worthy sons - defenders of the Fatherland, and expressed confidence that the volunteers would adequately cope with all the tasks set by the country's leadership in protecting the interests of Russia. The mourners also wished the soldiers good luck and a speedy safe return home. I also join all the wishes.
 
Those who, at the call of their hearts, want to stand up for the defense of the Fatherland can personally contact the mayor's office of the city of Grozny @grozmerr or call the phone numbers: +79256617777, +79253197777, +79253287777. Our specialists will certainly provide full assistance in this matter. AKHMAT-POWER!!!

description: The Ukrainian Center for Countering Disinformation, led by Andrei Kovalenko, has been conducting psychological operations in Russia, aiming to incite ethnic hatred. They infiltrate Russian Telegram channels and chats, spreading lies to cause mutual discontent among various ethnic groups, including Tajiks and Chechens.
original:
Forwarded from: MediaKiller
The British The Times describes the “psychological operations” carried out by Ukrainians in the Russian Federation. The newspaper interviews Andrei Kovalenko, the new head of the “Center for Countering Disinformation” created by Zelensky. And he openly says that one of the main tasks of his center is to incite ethnic hatred within Russia. He admits that his subordinates, under the guise of representatives of various ethnic groups, infiltrate Russian Telegram channels and chats, spreading lies in order to cause mutual discontent. After Crocus, they incite hatred against Tajiks and, conversely, within Tajik groups - against Russians. One of the important goals is to incite anti-Chechen sentiments in the Russian Federation. “We saw and intensified attempts to cause a conflict with the Chechens, saying: “The Chechens are everywhere in Moscow, and they will kill the Russian just like they did with the Tajik.” This was presented on behalf of Russians who don’t like Tajiks, but hate Chechens even more,” Kovalenko states in particular.

event: Transfer of Institutions to Ministry of Education
description: Over 1,000 institutions in the LPR will come under the Ministry of Education's jurisdiction. The transition aims to introduce a new financing principle and centralized management, standardizing education programs and textbooks to ensure consistency across schools.
original:
More than a thousand institutions of the LPR will come under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education of the Republic
Minister of Education and Science of the Lugansk People's Republic Ivan Kusov emphasized that the transition process will not affect teams of organizations, students and parents. Among the expected changes are
Show more
application of a new principle of financing and the formation of a centralized management mechanism.
“Before there was freedom of programs, freedom of textbooks, freedom to choose the form of education. This has given rise to many good innovative forms of education. But it also led to the fact that there are 13 algebra textbooks and programs, 15 biology textbooks. And each school chooses a separate program for itself. <…> As a result, a child, moving from city to city or even transferring to a neighboring school, ends up in a completely different program. The community is being lost,” Kusov explained.
Source: LuganskInformCenter

description: Ukrainian UAVs, specifically UJ-22 Airborne UAVs, attacked Tatarstan, demonstrating a destruction range of over 1000 km. One UAV targeted the Elaz-Nefteproduct refinery, causing a fire, while another struck a dormitory, which is part of a complex housing students and workers involved in assembling Shaheeds, Iranian kamikaze drones.
original:
Forwarded from: artjockey
Ukrainian UAVs attacked Tatarstan. The distance to Yelabuga is more than 1,200 kilometers; the UJ-22 Airborne UAVs with a wingspan of 4.6 meters were used for the attack. That is, Ukraine has reached beyond 1000 km in terms of destruction range.

One UAV attacked the Elaz-Nefteproduct refinery. According to the authorities: “the technological process has not been disrupted.” However, a fire broke out at the enterprise and it was reported that it had entered the primary processing unit. But the second one ended up in a dormitory, which led to confusion about the purpose, as well as moaning about “poor students.”

However, this is not an easy hostel: a complex of hostels that was built for college students and workers of the special economic zone. The building right next to the dormitories is a hangar where Shaheeds are assembled, and the students themselves are involved in the assembly. Last year there was an extensive material by Medusa on this topic: https://meduza.io/feature/2023/07/24/studentov-kolledzha-v-tatarstane-otpravili-sobirat-iranskie-drony-kamikadze-dlya-rossiyskoy-armiiHowever Those who don’t like Medusa can watch the official story from the local authorities, which shows the plant and those same students. It’s strange to film reports about military production during the war, and then be surprised at what flies there.

It is not clear what the goal was. Is it just a lack of production by the Shaheeds or a deliberate attack on the hostel so that all the workers would escape from the factory?

As for protection against such attacks, I just wrote two notes about this: https://t.me/artjockey/706 https://t.me/artjockey/756 About how you can detect UAVs, how to shoot them down, etc. d.
And after the publication of my notes, just a few days ago, the Russian Defense Ministry announced that they had begun creating mobile air defense groups in exactly the same form as Ukraine: trucks with ZU-23-2, pickup trucks with machine guns, as well as auxiliary forces. Better late than never, of course, but the problem was obvious and required a solution for a long time.

And without a second component in the form of alternative means of detecting UAVs, it is unlikely to work well, except to directly protect the perimeters of individual objects.

description: Border guards in the Pskov region intercepted a cargo shipment from Europe, discovering 27 homemade bombs hidden in icons and church utensils. The carrier was detained, and the organizers and accomplices will be put on the wanted list.
original:
Forwarded from: Russia Z🇷🇺
The intelligence services of the Kyiv regime have more than once shown the diabolical nature of their destructive, inhuman activities. A clear illustration of this is the explosion of a car on the Crimean Bridge, transporting construction materials that contained explosives, and the attempt on the life of military correspondent Vladlen Taktarsky, with an explosive device mounted in a gift bust.

So this time, the devil worshipers decided to use their favorite tactic of hiding explosives, hiding deadly substances in icons and church utensils.

Fortunately, the professionalism of the border guards inspecting cargo in transit from Europe at the checkpoint in the Pskov region made it possible to prevent further terrorist attacks.

In total, during inspection of the cargo, border guards seized 27 homemade bombs. The carrier has been detained. The organizers and accomplices will be put on the wanted list. Russia Z

event: Creation of Land Bank for Housing Construction
description: The Ministry of Construction and Housing and Communal Services of Russia has created a 'land bank' of vacant plots for new housing construction in Donbass and Novorossia. The register includes 308 plots in 19 settlements, covering a total area of 18.97 million sq. m with a potential for 8 million sq. m of housing.
original: More than 300 plots in 19 settlements of Donbass and Novorossia have already been included in the register for housing construction. The press service of the Ministry of Construction and Housing and Communal Services of Russia reported this to LIC. “An important issue in the development of regions is the creation of conditions for new housing construction. For this purpose, a “land bank” of vacant plots has been created. The list contains 308 plots in 19 settlements with a total area of 18.97 million sq. m with a city potential of about 8 million sq. m of housing,” the Ministry of Construction reported.

description: A tribute was paid to Maxim Fomin, also known as Vladlen Tatarsky, a Russian militiaman who contributed significantly to the cause. His efforts will not be forgotten.
original:
There will be Novorossiya, there will be! A midshipman was once on the roof of the house next to the one where the terrorist attack took place. St. Petersburg is calmly and majestically waiting for Kyiv and Kharkov, Odessa and Nikolaev to return under its sovereign hand.

Maxim Fomin (creative pseudonym - Vladlen Tatarsky) did a lot for this. Rest in peace, Russian militiaman.

We will win.

event: Strike on Alabuga Special Economic Zone
description: A strike was carried out on the Alabuga special economic zone in Tatarstan, where the assembly of Iranian Shahed combat drones was organized.
original: Footage taken immediately after the strike on the Alabuga special economic zone in Tatarstan, where the assembly of Iranian Shahed combat drones was organized.

description: The Russian public launched an information attack by posting a video from 2022, showcasing an escape from Kharkiv. This is a continuation of their efforts to spread disinformation.
original:
Looks carefully. The Russians launch an information attack again.
Only a lazy or disobedient Russian public did not post a video with "escape from Kharkiv on the opposite side"
Keep in mind, the video is from the year 2022, the time period when the invasion started. Therefore, just take a look, show that the Russian continues to do his work. Nai will indulge in their funny little ipso.
DBL BLD.

description: A Russian missile strike hit the Dnipro, damaging buildings of a college and kindergarten. Rescue operations are underway, with all services on site. Ukrainian President Zelenskiy thanked first responders and emphasized the importance of air defense systems to protect lives from Russian terror.
original:
Forwarded from: Zelenskiy / Official
Rescue operations are currently underway in the Dnipro after a Russian missile strike. In particular, the buildings of the college and kindergarten were damaged. All services are on site. And I thank all the first responders who go to the places of impact to help people as quickly as possible. This is the most important thing.

It is equally important that Russian terrorists receive answers to their attacks. More far-reaching answers each time. Thank you to each of our soldiers, to all Ukrainian men and women who ensure this. The Russian system of war, everyone who is involved in this aggression - all of them must really feel that the aggression will not go away just like that. Evil must lose. And will lose. And I emphasize again: air defense for Ukraine is the protection of life, this is what should work, the air defense systems that exist in the world cannot simply gather dust somewhere on the bases, when they can save thousands of lives from Russian terror.

I thank everyone who helps Ukraine! Thank you to everyone who protects life, our state, our independence! Thanks to our soldiers! Thanks to everyone who is holding his ground and destroying the occupier. We must win.
Glory to Ukraine!

description: NULL
original: 💧Kembe FallsLocated 450 km east of Bangui on the road to Bangassou, Kembe Falls on🌊the Cotto River are probably the most beautiful in🇨🇫Central African Republic. The waterfall is divided into two parts by a rocky spur, and it is curious that during the dry season only one of them is active, and you can see the steep rapids of the large waterfall. #nature #life

description: Members of the BAIKAL detachment of the 7th Assault St. George Brigade of the Union of Volunteers of Donbass showcased their diverse personalities. One fighter, known as 'Grandfather', entertained his comrades by playing the Jew's harp in his free time.
original: The fighters of the "BAIKAL" detachment of the 7th Assault St. George Brigade of the Union of Volunteers of Donbass are not only brave warriors, but also diversified personalities.☝🏻The call sign "Grandfather" in moments of leisure, pleases the personnel of the detachment by playing an exotic musical instrument - the Jew's harp.

event: Ukrainian Drone Strike on Russian Territory
description: Ukrainian drones carried out the longest strike on Russian territory since the beginning of the war, targeting Tatarstan. Despite this, a local United Russia member remains confident that the strikes strengthen Russia's confidence in its actions.
original:
🤣💥“Who did they think they were intimidating? Descendants of the people who took Paris in 1815? This is how the general director of the Alabuga SEZ responded to today’s attack on Tatarstan. However, there is a nuance - Russian troops took Paris in 1814, and not in the 15th, as Timur Shagivaleev said.

Ukrainian drones last night carried out the longest strike on Russian territory since the beginning of the war. However, the local United Russia member from the State Council of Tatarstan is still confident that the strikes of the Armed Forces of Ukraine supposedly “strengthen the confidence that Russia is on the right path.”

event: Evacuation of Animals Due to Floods
description: The 'Pride Land' shelter for predatory animals in the Moscow region was closed due to floods caused by a nearby overflowing river. The animals, including a panther, were relocated to a safe area as the water continues to rise.
original:
😔Due to floods, it is necessary to evacuate not only people, but also animals. The knee-deep, knee-deep shelter for predatory animals “Pride Land” in the Moscow region was closed, and the animals were transported to a safe place.

The cause of the flood was a river nearby that overflowed its banks. According to employees, the water continues to rise, and at night things can get much worse.🐾You can tell by the perplexed face of the panther that she is not very happy about the warm days that have come...@radiomirby

description: The FSB intercepted a smuggling channel delivering explosives from Ukraine, seizing icons containing hexogen, a potent explosive substance capable of destroying a five-story building.
original: The FSB publishes a video of the suppression of a smuggling channel for the delivery of explosives from Ukraine. Hidden in the icons seized in the Pskov region was hexogen, an explosive substance sufficient to blow up a five-story building, the video shows.

description: Venezuelan President Maduro announced an upcoming visit to Russia, expressing solidarity with the Russian people following the terrorist attack on March 22 in Crocus City Hall near Moscow.
original:
Forwarded from: Lomovka
The President of Venezuela announced an imminent visit to Russia. In addition, Madurov once again expressed solidarity with the Russian people in connection with the terrorist attack on March 22 in the Crocus City Hall near Moscow. Tell Russian President Vladimir Putin that I will come to him soon, the Venezuelan leader said .

The date and place of the meeting are still unknown.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

description: The Ukrainian Armed Forces used a ground-based Ratel S drone to blow up a bridge west of Ivanovsky (Krasnoe), aiming to slow down the Russian Armed Forces' advance towards Chasov Yar.
original:
The Ukrainian Armed Forces showed the undermining of a bridge west of Ivanovsky (Krasnoe) using a ground-based Ratel S drone. The bridge was blown up to slow down the advance of the Russian Armed Forces to Chasov Yar.
It is interesting that the last time the Ukrainian Armed Forces blew up their own bridges was in March-April 2022, when the Russian Armed Forces “rushed” in all directions, conducting an offensive.
Military Informant

description: Mass demonstrations erupted in at least six major Turkish cities following the disqualification of pro-Kurdish DEM candidate Abdullah Zeidan from the elections. Protesters clashed with police, firing machine guns, setting tires ablaze, and throwing Molotov cocktails. Security forces responded with tear gas and batons, making arrests.
original:
Several Turkish cities were swept by a wave of protests with shooting and burning of tires in the streets.

Mass demonstrations began in at least six major cities following the decision of the Van provincial election commission to disqualify pro-Kurdish DEM candidate Abdullah Zeidan from the elections. It is reported that he previously won, but the mandate was given to the candidate from Erdogan's party. Amid tensions, local authorities banned mass gatherings from April 3 to April 17. Also on social networks and media outlets close to the Kurdistan Workers' Party, they are calling on residents to take to the streets.

Dozens of people are starting fights with the police, firing machine guns in the streets, setting tires on fire and throwing Molotov cocktails at law enforcement officers. In response they receive tear gas and blows with batons. Security forces are making arrests. Subscribe to SHOTSend news

event: Combat Missions in Special Military Operation Zone
description: The 'Center' grouping of troops carried out combat missions in the zone of the Special Military Operation, inflicting artillery fire and air strikes on 400 identified enemy targets, including a command post, strong points, and field artillery positions. Ukrainian losses included 295 military personnel, a tank, armored combat vehicles, cars, and unmanned aerial vehicles.
original:
Statement by the head of the press center of the "Center" grouping. The "Center" grouping of troops continues to carry out combat missions in the zone of the Special Military Operation. Artillery fire and air strikes inflicted fire on 400 identified enemy targets, including a command post, 39 strong points, and more than 80 field artillery positions. Losses of the Armed Forces of Ukraine amounted to 295 military personnel. A tank, five armored combat vehicles, five cars, and two unmanned aerial vehicles were destroyed.

During the counter-battery fight, the Akatsiya and Gvozdika self-propelled artillery mounts, 122 mm BM-21 Grad MLRS, two D-30 howitzers, an M119 gun and a 120 mm mortar were hit.

Air defense systems shot down a Hymers MLRS rocket and a guided aerial bomb.🔹Russian Ministry of Defense

description: DTEK's thermal power plants suffered large-scale attacks, resulting in 80% loss of generating capacity. Five out of six TPPs were seriously damaged, leaving the situation extremely difficult.
original:
‼DTEK publishes terrible footage of what one of the thermal power plants looks like now after large-scale attacks by the enemy. 80% of the company's generating capacity has been lost. 5 out of 6 TPPs were seriously damaged.

The situation is extremely difficult...

description: A warehouse in Simferopol caught fire, engulfing a 650 square meter hangar containing equipment for beauty salons. Fortunately, no one was injured. Emergency responders quickly localized the fire, with 43 specialists and 14 pieces of equipment working to contain the blaze.
original:
A warehouse caught fire in Simferopol. A hangar with equipment for beauty salons burned on an area of 650 square meters, the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations said.

According to preliminary data, no one was injured.

Rescuers have already localized the fire. 43 specialists and 14 pieces of equipment are working on site. Subscribe to RIA Novosti Crimea

description: Enemy forces launched a counterattack on American Bradleys near Avdiivka, but were defeated by our fighters who met them with fire. One Bradley was destroyed after striking mines while attempting to retreat, while the other was covered.
original: Battles near Avdievka: the enemy launched a counterattack on American Bradleys and was defeated. Our fighters met the enemy with fire. One Bradley struck mines while attempting to retreat. The other one was covered.wagner_story

original:

This is stated in the report of the World Bank and the UN.Subscribe|Submit news

original: Riots broke out in the Turkish city of Hakkari, and gendarmerie troops were deployed there.

description: Viktor Bout expressed support for lifting the moratorium on the death penalty in Russia, specifically for terrorist acts, brutal war crimes, and treason to the Motherland, during a meeting with students at SevSU.
original: Viktor Bout supported the idea of lifting the moratorium on the death penalty in Russia, he spoke about this during a meeting with students at SevSU⠀ “In the case of terrorist acts, in the case of brutal war crimes, there should be the death penalty. Also for treason to the Motherland,” noted But.⠀The ex-political prisoner is visiting Sevastopol with his exhibition of paintings, which will be opened at the Center for Culture and Culture.

description: On March 10, the Armed Forces of Ukraine carried out a terrorist attack, shelling the city center of Pologi, causing damage to the 'Lisichka' kindergarten, including broken windows.
original: In the “Lisichka” kindergarten, windows damaged as a result of shelling by the Armed Forces of Ukraine were restored. The management of the “Lisichka” kindergarten in the city of Pologi expressed gratitude to the Administration of the Pologo Municipal District for the prompt assistance provided in replacing double-glazed windows that were damaged as a result of the terrorist attack carried out by militants of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on March 10, shelling the city center of Pologi.

description: Poland has submitted a proposal to the Sejm to track Russian cruise missiles using fire towers and mobile communication towers as part of the 'Web' project.
original:
Poland plans to track Russian missiles from fire fighters and mobile towers, -Defence24 A decision to protect against Russian cruise missiles has already been submitted to the Sejm. The project was called "Web".

This involves the active use of civil towers, primarily fire towers, as well as mobile communication towers.
